Articles.Content:
Hi, not sure if this is the correct forum for this...

Im looking for a mod that gives more realistic and structured mission progression. For example, slowly focus the KSP on getting to the Mun (Send probes, then flyby then land etc) then move on to Duna etc. At the moment the missions just seem wild and random. Is there such a mod?

Perhaps ['Better Than Starting Manned'](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/61632) would be worth a look. There are probably quite a few others that might fit your criteria. Maybe try taking a look at [this list of mods](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/55401-Community-Mods-and-Plugins-Library).

Hope this helps.

Happy landings!

Also look at the Contract Configurator line of mods:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101604-0-90-Contract-Configurator-v0-7-4-2015-03-26](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101604-0-90-Contract-Configurator-v0-7-4-2015-03-26)

Some of the contract packs will offer what you want.

> 
> Perhaps ['Better Than Starting Manned'](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/61632) would be worth a look. . .

I'll second this. BTSM features a well thought out tech and progression path and is certainly worth looking at.
Add-on Affairs is the right subforum for this, and so, moved.
